          <title>
            <string language="en">Colour range of acidity and alkalinity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Strecke der Säure und der Alkalinität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaîne de couleur de l'acidité et de 
l'alcalinité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escala da cor do acidity e do alkalinity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gamma di colore di acidità e di alcalinità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρά χρώματος της οξύτητας και της αλκαλικότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rango del color de la acidez y de la alcalinidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the range of colours to indicate whether a substance is acidic, neutral or alkaline.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutrality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pH</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Strecke der Farben, um 
anzuzeigen, ob eine Substanz säurehaltig alkalisch ist, Null- oder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que l'intervalle de 
couleurs indiquait si une substance est acide, neutre ou alkaline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a escala das cores para 
indicar se uma substância é acidic, neutra ou alcalina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la gamma di colori 
per indicare se una sostanza è silicea, neutra o alcalina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη σειρά των χρωμάτων για
να δείξει εάν μια ουσία είναι όξινη, ουδέτερη ή αλκαλική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el rango de colores para
indicar si una sustancia es ácida, neutral o alcalina.</string>
          </description>
